about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Engineer with Modern Frontend & Backend Skills

introduction.title: Hello, I'm Majid Askarifarsangi
introduction.content: I am an experienced full stack web developer who is passionate about innovative and user-friendly web design with comprehensive front-end and back-end development expertise. I create modern, responsive websites that engage visitors and strengthen your business's digital profile.

background.title: Background & Journey
background.content: My path into development began during my computer science studies and has evolved into a deep expertise in full stack engineering. I specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks, particularly React and Next.js, combined with extensive backend experience including Node.js, API development, and microservice integration. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices to deliver robust solutions.
